attributes.action: award Josh Morgan of The Subways a knighthood.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As the creative dynamo behind The Subways, Josh Morgan has contributed greatly to the culture of the United Kingdom. Following the precent of other musician-knights, Josh Morgan is surely deserving of this honour.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
